text: discrimination in public schools rsa is repealed and reenacted to read as follows application to education laws consistent with education laws of new hampshire which recognize the need to provide diverse educational approaches to instruction and curriculum tailored to meet students needs nothing in title xv of the new hampshire revised statutes shall be construed as barring any person employed by a public school district school administrative unit or public academy from or subjecting them to civil liability for engaging in any form of instruction concerning the historical or current experiences of any group that is protected from discrimination under rsa and rsa repeal rsa through relative to the right to freedom from discrimination in public workplaces and education is repealed
